content:
### Bug fixes

* [Google Drive:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledrive/index.md) Fixed an issue with the Drive resource
* [Notion:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.notion/index.md) Fixed an issue with the filtering fields type and fixed an issue with the link option
* [Switch:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.switch.md) Fixed an issue with the Expression mode
